post.body: maybe you could setup a whiskey cart outside Toys r us like they always have a hotdog cart outside Home Depot??
definitely iPhone. though they won't let you tether.
sounds fun. That guy in the red suit really gets around. He was in Blythe yesterday.
- @sejwickrogue got it right the first time.
Vacation during holidays=awesome. Woke up & in head 2day was day after Christmas & days until anything else. No realization of Fri. at all.
That was definitely one of the lowest-key, stress-free, most fun Christmas Days ever. Extremely nice.
Oldest son unwrapping cell phone: 'I don't know what my number is!' Firefighter obsessed son wearing new fire suit: 'My phone number is 911'
http://twitpic.com/wew7 - New shirt. Awesome.
Wishing all of my friends, both old and new, a Merry Christmas, safe travels, happiness and peace.
Back from church, homemade spaghetti and merlot, kids all healthy, santa being tracked on radar. Very nice evening.
Finally a patch to fix mail send bug on WM 6.1 phones: http://tinyurl.com/6py6ve
Note to self: b4 taking the rare nap turn off twitter device notification lest u have equivalent of a broken, evil, possessed snooze bar.
Listening to 1st Wave and trying to come up with an argument that makes sense to an 18 month old as to why one really should wear pants.
Am being slept on again. Well dreamt on actually. And downloading some Christmas music from Rhapsody.
http://twitpic.com/um68 - Overnight rain + cold = iced up outside heat pump coil. Probably the only ice or snow we will get in the desert :)
I use twitter.com, txt & TwitterFox. Any better tool to organize tweets that is a mashup, runs as a FireFox add-on or on Windows Mobile?
There is nothing quite as good as an iced Mocha for breakfast.
Wondering if one could use prescription cough medicine to make a Flaming Homer. Hmmmm...
Truly the start of the holiday break has induced full-fledged SFB in the kids.
One of the things I like about my job. Off work until the 5th. Woot!
